mapper.select: SELECT va AS vaCodel,va_create_time,transaction_id,MODE FROM t_loan_user_transaction_repay GROUP BY id HAVING (TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,MAX(va_create_time),NOW())) <=6 AND transaction_id = #{payId} AND MODE = #{mode}
SELECT t.payment_id AS transactionId, t.account AS cardNo, t.amount AS price, LOWER(t.bank) AS bankType from t_loan_user_transaction t where t.id=#{id}
